title: Get Top Scores
description:
Create a class with method getTopThree(ArrayList<Integer> scores) that:
- Returns a new ArrayList with the top 3 highest scores in descending order
- If less than 3 scores, return all of them sorted
Hint: Sort in reverse order and take first 3
